short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change background and foreground colors for eye health and normal vision, support simple change, entire change and smart change.
short.zh_CN: 修改网页的背景色与前景色，来保护您的眼睛与视力, 支持简单修改, 全部修改和智能修改三种方式.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Let you jump to another webpage without any mouse move/click.

This extension is inspired by EMACS's ace jump. 

1. When installed, press Alt + J (Command + J) in any webpage
2. It will mark all the hyperlinks in current webpage, with 3 letters at most
3. Input the letters in order then it will jump to that hyperlink

That's it. Enjoy.
long.zh_CN:
使用键盘快速跳转网页。

这个chrome扩展收到EMAC的Ace Jump插件的启发。

1. 安装后，在任意网页中按下 Alt + J (Command + J)
2. 它将标记出当前网页中的所有超链接，每个标记最多不超过3个字母
3. 按顺序输入这些字母后，浏览器将跳转到超链接对应的网页

That's it. Enjoy.
